_AttachExtendedSealedFileEvidenceText: The Scrive e-signing system sealed the document with a keyless digital signature.
_AttachGuardtimeSealedFileEvidenceText: The Scrive e-signing system sealed the document with a digital signature.
_AttachSealedFileEvidenceText: The Scrive e-signing system prepared the Evidence Package before sealing with a digital signature.$if(full)$ The Evidence Package consists of the Verification Page, Evidence Log, Evidence of Intent, Evidence Documentation and Digital Signature Documentation (all as defined in the Evidence Documentation).$endif$
_CancelDocumenElegEvidenceText: The Scrive e-signing system rejected the $signatory$’s attempt to sign the document. The reason for the rejection was that the $signatory$’s identity information did not match the identity information received from the e-ID provider.$if(full)$ Information given by the e-ID provider: $msg$.$endif$
_CancelDocumentEvidenceText: The invitation to sign was withdrawn$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$. The possibility to sign the document was disabled by the Scrive e-signing system.
_CloseDocumentEvidenceText: The Scrive e-signing system locked the document from further modifications by the signing parties.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailText: An invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ was delivered$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSText: An invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ was delivered$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ by SMS.
_InvitationEvidenceText:
The Scrive e-signing system sent an invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. The invitation included a link that when clicked lead to the Online Sign View.$if(text)$ The invitation contained the following message:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailText: The Scrive e-signing system’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ could not be delivered and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSText: The Scrive e-signing system’s external SMS delivery system reported that the invitation$if(!archive)$ to $signatory$$endif$ could not be delivered and continued attempts were cancelled.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceText: The Scrive e-signing system’s external email delivery system reported that the invitation$_to_review_or_sign()$ (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_PreparationToPendingEvidenceText: The editing of the document was finalised$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$, and the Scrive e-signing system locked the document from editing.$if(full)$ The signing process language was set to $lang$, and the signing due date was set to $timeouttime$ UTC.$if(timezone)$ The time zone $timezone$ was provided by $actor$.$endif$$endif$
_ProlongDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing was prolonged$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
_RejectDocumentEvidenceText:
The invitation to sign was rejected$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$. The possibility to sign the document was disabled by the Scrive e-signing system.$if(text)$ The rejection message$if(!archive)$ from $actor$$endif$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ReminderSendText:
It was requested $if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$ that a reminder to sign should be sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$$if(full)$, and the Scrive e-signing system sent the reminder$endif$.$if(text)$ The reminder message$if(!archive)$ from $actor$$endif$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ResealedPDFText: Preparation of the Evidence Package was requested by $if(!archive)$$actor$, $endif$a person authorised to administer the Scrive e-signing system.
_RestartDocumentEvidenceText: The signing process settings were opened in the Design View for editing $if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
_SignDocumentEvidenceText:
The document was signed$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$$_using_identification_method()$.$if(eleg)$$if(full)$

The text signed in the e-ID client was: 

$infotext$

E-legitimation provider: $provider$.

$if(fieldsverified)$

Information about signatory verified by $provider$: $if(fstnameverified)$ First name; $endif$ $if(lstnameverified)$ Last name; $endif$ $if(persnumverified)$ Personal number; $endif$

$endif$

Signature:

$signature$

$if(certificate)$

Certificate:

$certificate$

$endif$ $if(ocsp)$

Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) Response:

$ocsp$

$endif$$endif$$endif$
_SignatoryLinkVisitedText: The Sign View was opened$if(!archive)$ by $actor$$endif$.
_TimeoutDocumentEvidenceText: The due date for signing the document passed. The possibility to sign was disabled by the Scrive e-signing system.
